$Great diving catch by Erstad, but injured ankle and was batted for in bottom of first; this was his first game back from the DL after three weeks2007CHA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,guilo001,M,westj901,Obstruction call $Pie stopped at 3B, Pagan was caught between 2B and 3B as DeRosa headed to 2B; Uribe tagged out Pagan and then threw home where Pie was tagged out in a rundown; the umpires conferred and ruled that Uribe obstructed Pagan as he tried to go from 1B to 3B; the runners were put back on the bases and White Sox Mgr Ozzie Guillen calmly argued the play and told umpire crew chief Joe West: 'You are just going to have to run me.' Guillen was ejected by West2007CHA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

$McDonald and Clayton did not realize that McDonald was in the lineup as the starting shortstop.
